altTitles.ja: HOTEL ミレニアム・サービス編

description.en:
DECADE Hotel staff. Assigned to the front desk. Athletic hot-blooded), Ayaka Homura (A returnee who is fluent in languages. Graduated from a first-class science university. Cool but kind-hearted personality.) Synopsis / Ichiro Tanaka, who made a reservation by e-mail. A man named The address is fictitious, there is no phone number... Todo puts a stop to the newcomer who decides it's a prank and tries to cancel the reservation. Before long, the staff found a woman and a child in the lobby with a brooding look on their faces. It is said that the parent and child are meeting with Ichiro Tanaka... (Episode 1). -Features of this volume / The long-awaited new series of [Hotel]!! In today's world where
information and people are changing at high speed, what is Plato's proposal of "true hospitality"...!?
A veteran concierge with 54 years of experience as a hotel man), Toshiharu Matsuda (veteran front man. A bit careless)

biography.en:
Name (in native language)
シュガー佐藤
